text: Thovalapookkal is a 1995 Indian Malayalam film, directed by Suresh Unnithan, starring Jagathy Sreekumar and Urvashi in the lead roles. http://spicyonion.com/title/thovalapookkal-malayalam-movie/ ==Cast== * Jagathy Sreekumar as Bhoothapandi/Sreenivasan * Urvashi as Chembakam * Nandakishor as Venugopalan Thamby * Kuthiravattam Pappu as Rajappan * Jose Pellissery as Vasu Pilla * Indrans as Thankayyan Nadar *N. F. Varghese as Col. Gopalan Thamby *Zeenath as Lakshmi * Thilakan as Valakudy Velayudham Thalaivan *Poojappura Radhakrishnan as Suseelan *Bindu Panicker as Gomathy Suseelan * Adoor Bhavani as Seetha patti * Kollam Thulasi as Kottar Sadashivam *Suresh Palakkad as Rajamaniyam *Usha as Shobha * Jagannathan *Anoop Krishnan *N. L. Balakrishnan ==References== ==External links== * Category:1995 films Category:Indian films Category:1990s Malayalam-language films
title: Thovalapookkal
